alert.note: Alert for Bertie (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:56PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bertie County through 630 PM EDT... At 556 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lewiston Woodville to near Tarboro. Movement was east southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Lewiston Woodville around 610 PM EDT. Windsor around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Askewville, Republican and Quitsna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
